alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 4:59PM EDT until June 04 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Western Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Monticello, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cody, Fanlew, Lamont, Waukeenah, Capps, Wacissa, Lloyd, Wacissa Springs, Nash and Thomas City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
